[`DataWriteOptions`](../DataWriteOptions) › [`ctime`](./ctime)

## DataWriteOptions.ctime property

Time of creation, represented as a unix timestamp, in milliseconds. Omit this if you want to keep the default behaviour.

**Signature:**

```typescript
ctime?: number;
```
